UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CRAMP analogues having potent antibiotic activity against bacterial, fungal, and tumor cells without hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Shin SY, Kang SW, Lee DG, Eom SH, Song WK, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=50.0µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=12.5µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1918(MIC=50.0µM),Streptococcus pyogenes KCTC 3096(MIC=50.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=>50.0µM),Candida albicans TIMM 1768(MIC=50.0µM),Aspergillus fumigatus KCTC 4165(MIC=100.0µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>100µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=>100µM),Jurkat cells E6-1(IC50=>100µM)
